verbs.description: In the simplest form of nuclear weapon , two portions of uranium [V: are] hurled together to reach “ critical mass ” resulting in a enormous explosion . With Donald Trump and Kim Jong - un both in Singapore on Monday morning , on the brink of being face - to - face , ...
